member.name: T:YifyLib.Yify
member.summary: Provides access to YTS API v2

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate a new Yify class object

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Instantiate a new Yify class object with given YTS API base URI
member.param: Base URI for YTS API, Base URI should be an absolute URI which conforms with Base URI + Relative Path criteria. Ex: https://yts.to/v2/ + list_movies.xml

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new Yify class object with given YTS API application key
member.exception: If applicationKey parameter is empty or null

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.#ctor(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Instantiate a new Yify class object with given YTS API application key and its base baseUri
member.param: Base URI for YTS API, Base URI should be an absolute URI which conforms with Base URI + Relative Path criteria. Ex: https://yts.to/v2/ + list_movies.xml

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.ListMovies(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,YifyLib.SearchResultSort,YifyLib.SortOrder)
member.summary: Search or list movies in YTS
member.param: Genre of the movie (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)
Minimum rating of the movie. Ex: 0 to 9
The limit of results per page. Ex: 20
Page number to view the movies Ex: Limit 15 and Page 2 will show you movies 15 to 30
Sorts the results by chosen field
Order of the results in Ascending or Descending order
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetMovie(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get movie details for a particular movie
member.param: If true cast information will be included
If true movie images will be included
member.returns: Movie object containing the movie result

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetMovieSuggestion(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get suggestion fro particular movie
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetMovieComments(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get comments made by YTS users for a particular movie
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetMovieReviews(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get movie reviews made for a particular movie
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetMovieParentalGuide(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get parental guides for a movie
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetUserDetails(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get user details
member.returns: User class object containing user details.
member.exception: If any errors occurred YTS process

member.summary: Login to the Yify torrent.
member.exception: If application key is missing
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.GetProfile
member.summary: Get the logged in user's Yify profile
member.exception: If user has not logged in
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.EditUserSettings(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Edit user's profile
member.returns: Updated profile of the current user
member.exception: If application key is missing
If user has not logged in
If the avatar image could not be found in the specified location
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.RegisterUser(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Register a new user on Yify torrent
member.exception: If application key is missing
If Username, Password or Email is empty or null
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.ForgotUserPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Send a password recovery request to Yify torrent. If the email is valid Yify torrent will email a password rest code which can be used on ResetUserPassword function.
member.returns: True if the request is successful
member.exception: If application key is missing
If Email is empty or null
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.name: M:YifyLib.Yify.ResetUserPassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reset the user password
member.exception: If application key is missing
If Reset Code or New Password is empty or null
If any errors occurred YTS process

If user has not logged in
If movie id is invalid
If any errors occurred YTS process

If any errors occurred YTS process

If comment id is invalid
If any errors occurred YTS process

member.param: Message from user which can include a short description, IMDb links, and 1080p/720p sources which YTS can encode from
member.exception: If application key is missing
If user has not logged in
If movie id or request message is null or empty
If any errors occurred YTS process
